## ... in a nutshell

I am Edu 👋 , welcome to my blog!

I am an economist turned into data scientist with international and multicultural experience in analytics. Throughout my career in several industries, I have been passionate about deriving actionable insights from complex data to address business needs and drive meaningful impact.

My areas of expertise involve the application of Machine Learning and (quasi) experimental methods. This blog aims to share reflections about these that may help others in their data journey.

In addition munging with data, in my free time I 🚴‍♂️, sometimes [for a while](https://www.northcape-tarifa.com/2022-tracking/), and 🏃‍♂️ in [weird places](http://www.saharamarathon.org/en/races/results-2015/).

Enjoy your stay and if you have comments or suggestions please do not hesitate to send me an email to [eduardogonzaloalmorox\@gmail.com](https://edugonzalmo.netlify.app/page/about/eduardogonzaloalmorox@gmail.com) or reach me out on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EdudinGonzalo).
